ch0120_00_lusamine/0101_0701_01_10:
Today’s another day to be a good mother to all
Pokémon—and to my own children as well,
of course.
ch0120_00_lusamine/0101_0701_02_10:
You’re free to come to me as well if anything is
troubling you, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0120_00_lusamine/0601_0701_01_10: Your style is a bit wanting, hm?
ch0120_00_lusamine/0601_0701_02_10:
I’ll have to take you out sometime and help you
pick a smashing outfit.
ch0120_00_lusamine/0601_0701_03_10:
Changing your look is like a breath of fresh air.
It’s a chance to be reborn.
ch0120_00_lusamine/0602_0701_01_10:
Sync strength is quite a curious phenomenon,
isn’t it?
ch0120_00_lusamine/0602_0701_02_10:
I can feel my bond with my partner Pokémon
strengthening as we explore and battle together.
ch0120_00_lusamine/0602_0701_03_10:
I’m not simply protecting my Pokémon—we’re
overcoming challenges together and growing
stronger for it.
ch0120_00_lusamine/0603_0701_01_10: I’m interested in the PML myself, you know.
ch0120_00_lusamine/0603_0701_02_10:
It’s the perfect chance to witness a large number
of Pokémon battles!
ch0120_00_lusamine/0603_0701_03_10:
I’m planning to use the data I collect from these
battles to help me protect all Pokémon.
ch0120_00_lusamine/0604_0701_01_10:
I’ve realized something after encountering so many
Trainers here on Pasio.
ch0120_00_lusamine/0604_0701_02_10:
Protecting Pokémon, raising them to be strong,
and sometimes even letting them go...
ch0120_00_lusamine/0604_0701_03_10:
These are all ways of showing one’s love
for Pokémon.
ch0120_00_lusamine/0605_0701_01_10:
Children sure do grow up fast, don’t they,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0120_00_lusamine/0605_0701_02_10:
Even my own children were so small and innocent,
and now look at them! They’ve grown to be skilled
Trainers in their own right!
ch0120_00_lusamine/0605_0701_03_10:
You continue to amaze me as well. It almost
saddens me to watch, but my feelings of pride
outweigh that sadness.
ch0120_00_lusamine/1701_0701_01_10: Oh, there you are. I was looking for you.
ch0120_00_lusamine/1701_0701_02_10:
I wanted to give this to you. You will put it to
good use, won’t you?
ch0120_00_lusamine/1701_0702_01_10:
I’ll do whatever I can if it helps you sync pairs
find happiness.
ch0120_00_lusamine/2501_0701_01_10:
I was so shocked when my children rebelled
against me.
ch0120_00_lusamine/2501_0701_02_10:
But I suppose children rebelling against a parent
is simply proof that they are growing up.
ch0120_00_lusamine/2501_0701_03_10:
Our family has been through a lot, but now I can
look back and be proud of how far they’ve come.
ch0120_00_lusamine/2501_0702_01_10:
I’ve learned that sometimes I just need to watch
over my children without interfering.
ch0120_00_lusamine/2501_0702_02_10:
You’re about the same age as they are, right? I’d
appreciate it if you could help keep an eye on
them for me.
ch0120_00_lusamine/2501_0702_03_10:
I ask you this as their mother. I feel like I can trust
you, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0120_00_lusamine/2511_0701_01_10:
Your partner Pokémon seems very happy. That is
a beautiful thing to see.
ch0120_00_lusamine/2511_0701_02_10:
Behind all of my work is the hope that it will make
all Pokémon happy.
ch0120_00_lusamine/2511_0701_03_10:
I’d like to learn as much as I can from you sync
pairs to help me accomplish that goal.
ch0120_00_lusamine/2511_0702_01_10:
I’m quite fond of you and your partner Pokémon,
you know.
ch0120_00_lusamine/2511_0702_02_10: That’s why I’ve been watching over you.
ch0120_00_lusamine/2511_0702_03_10:
It would bring me great joy if you would confide
in me as if I were your actual mother.
ch0120_00_lusamine/3001_0701_01_10:
Good morning! You still look sleepy. Go wash up,
and I’m sure you’ll feel so much better!
ch0120_00_lusamine/3003_0701_01_10:
Another day I can work to make all Pokémon
happy! Would you lend me a hand?
ch0120_00_lusamine/3006_0701_01_10:
What are you doing up so late? Children would all
be much happier...if they’d only listen to the adults
around them.
